Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

244
00:28:01,967 --> 00:28:04,242
Shelly.

245

246

- Look, man, take anything you want.

247

- Take anything!

248
00:28:28,047 --> 00:28:31,801

of Tin Tin's little party pals.

249
00:28:31,887 --> 00:28:33,798
The Pit. They all
hang out at the Pit.

250
00:28:33,887 --> 00:28:39,519
All of T-Birds's little potato-heads
hang out there. And Funboy,
he lives there upstairs, all right?

251
00:28:39,607 --> 00:28:43,361
- Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

252

- Shit!
- A whole jolly club...

253

- Stop! Stop! Please!
- with jolly pirate nicknames!

254
00:28:48,567 --> 00:28:51,639
- Stop! Jesus Christ in a taxicab!

255

Each one of these is a life--

256

a life you helped destroy.

257
00:28:59,087 --> 00:29:01,555
Look, l'm begging you, all right?
Don't kill me.

258
00:29:03,087 --> 00:29:05,203

259

Tell them Eric Draven

262
00:29:23,527 --> 00:29:27,281
You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

263

You're nothing but street grease,
ya hear that-- street grease,
you mother fucker!

264
00:29:31,287 --> 00:29:35,883
- ls that gasoline l smell?

265
00:29:35,967 --> 00:29:39,277
No! No!

266
00:29:54,327 --> 00:29:57,637
lt's on the house, kiddo,

267
00:29:57,727 --> 00:29:59,877
One root beer.

268
00:30:01,847 --> 00:30:04,441

269

she's off right now.

270
00:30:08,887 --> 00:30:10,923

271

l said, ""Don't move!""

272

l thought the police
always said, ""Freeze.""

273

l am the police and l say don't move,

274
00:30:28,207 --> 00:30:32,325
And l say
l'm dead and l move.

275
00:30:32,407 --> 00:30:35,126
Not one more step.
l'm serious.

276
00:30:35,207 --> 00:30:39,359
Then shoot, if you will,

277
00:30:39,447 --> 00:30:44,157
What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun? You high?

278
00:30:44,247 --> 00:30:46,966

279

280
00:30:51,767 --> 00:30:53,837
Shelly Webster's dead,

281

l want you to move over
to the kurb there. Go on,

282
00:30:59,847 --> 00:31:02,998
Okay, we're gonna

283

-lt's gettin' too friggin' weird for me.

284

285

286

288

289

290
00:31:30,167 --> 00:31:31,885

295

296

297

298

Just wish l was a little

299

300

301

302
00:32:40,287 --> 00:32:42,517

304

305
00:32:53,847 --> 00:32:55,724

to do with that.

306

You must be awful disappointed.

307
00:32:58,247 --> 00:33:02,286
l got trouble. One of
my crew got himself perished.

308
00:33:02,367 --> 00:33:04,562

309

310

311

You're working for me

312
00:33:19,767 --> 00:33:24,443

313

314
00:33:29,207 --> 00:33:33,997

315

316

317
00:34:13,247 --> 00:34:14,919
Nah.

318
00:34:15,007 --> 00:34:18,158
You need to slow down,
you dickhead!

319
00:34:20,287 --> 00:34:23,962

- He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

320
00:34:25,927 --> 00:34:30,955

a clown or something?
- Sometimes.

321

lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

322
00:34:38,607 --> 00:34:41,997

- Eric?

323
00:34:58,287 --> 00:35:02,678

324

Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

325

326

""We, the undersigned tenants

327

328

for a very nice girl who found herself
a cause and the cause got her killed.

329
00:35:20,647 --> 00:35:23,286
She was fighting tenant eviction

330
00:35:23,367 --> 00:35:28,487
Miss Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

331
00:35:28,567 --> 00:35:32,480
You know, the last time
you went snooping around on a case is
when you got put back on the beat.

332
00:35:32,567 --> 00:35:36,401
- Yeah, l know.
Torres keeps reminding me.
- Oh, l bet he does.

333
00:35:43,967 --> 00:35:47,721
You're going to wind up

334
00:35:47,807 --> 00:35:53,757
- l'm cool.
- You didn't get that file from me,
okay? And don't tell me you owe me one.

335
00:35:53,847 --> 00:35:55,883
Ah, l owe you one!

336
00:35:55,967 --> 00:35:57,878
Yeah, right.

337
00:35:57,967 --> 00:36:00,370
Damn.

338
00:36:24,447 --> 00:36:28,122
Tomorrow night, we can--
we can get high...

339
00:36:28,207 --> 00:36:31,756
and watch this whole fucking city

340
00:36:34,207 --> 00:36:37,483
l am the park

341
00:36:37,567 --> 00:36:41,370
l am glow

342
00:36:41,127 --> 00:36:45,600
ln the mother fuckin' dark

343
00:36:45,087 --> 00:36:47,123
lam shocked

344
00:36:47,207 --> 00:36:48,799
And l see

345
00:36:48,887 --> 00:36:53,390
l don't want to believe

346
00:36:53,127 --> 00:36:55,880
No more

347
00:36:55,967 --> 00:36:58,117
- There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- No more

348
00:36:58,207 --> 00:37:00,840
Huh?

349
00:37:01,207 --> 00:37:05,410
- No more
- lt's a squab.

Come here, bird.
Hey, bird. Hey, bird.

351
00:37:08,727 --> 00:37:10,957
Bird. B-B-Birdie.

352
00:37:11,047 --> 00:37:13,515
Here, birdie, birdie, birdie,

353
00:37:13,607 --> 00:37:16,440
Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie,

354
00:37:18,967 --> 00:37:22,390
Birdie? Hey, birdie?

356
00:37:26,207 --> 00:37:28,721
What the fuck?

357
00:37:34,887 --> 00:37:39,199
No, man! Don't do that! You nearly

358
00:37:39,287 --> 00:37:41,357
Look at him.

359
00:37:41,447 --> 00:37:44,166
Don't sweat it.

360
00:37:45,167 --> 00:37:48,716
lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

361

Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

362
00:38:02,887 --> 00:38:08,200
You are seriously fucked up.

363
00:38:08,287 --> 00:38:11,400

364

Bingo!
He shoots. He scores.

365
00:38:27,567 --> 00:38:32,380
-Jesus Christ!

366

He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...

Don't you ever fuckin' die?

370

""Can you put me up

371
00:38:55,527 --> 00:39:00,555
- Does that hurt?

375

376

Stay away!
Stay away from me!

377

378

Mother is the name for God

379

380

lf l wanted ice, l would have

l really need this.

385
00:41:23,447 --> 00:41:26,484
-You burn yourself playing with matches?

386

00:41:37,207 --> 00:41:40,882

390
00:41:45,087 --> 00:41:48,124

391

392
00:42:17,647 --> 00:42:19,524

393
00:42:29,967 --> 00:42:33,755
Well, as you can see,
l'm here on the cornerof27th Street

the site of last year's biggest

395

lt was exactly one year ago

across thestreet from me...

396
00:42:40,647 --> 00:42:42,763

397
00:42:42,847 --> 00:42:47,318
The fire that was fought
By seven fire companies, but cost

398
00:42:47,407 --> 00:42:52,117
ln fact, if it weren't
for the constant surveillance

00:42:52,207 --> 00:42:54,846
Freeze!

00:42:54,927 --> 00:42:59,159
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

401
00:42:59,247 --> 00:43:02,717
Fuck.

402
00:43:02,807 --> 00:43:05,162

406

Holy shit.

407
00:43:22,687 --> 00:43:25,201
Say...

408
00:43:25,287 --> 00:43:29,405
are you some kind of-- of ghost?

409

Boo!

410

l don't know what l am. l need you

411
00:43:44,967 --> 00:43:48,846
Well, you took a six-story

412
00:43:48,927 --> 00:43:51,885

413
00:43:51,967 --> 00:43:56,358

Hey, you asked, man.

414
00:43:56,447 --> 00:43:58,722
l mean, come on.
Read the file.

415
00:43:58,807 --> 00:44:02,561
Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

416
00:44:02,647 --> 00:44:06,162
And her body finally
Just gave it up.

417
00:44:06,247 --> 00:44:09,523
l saw it, man.
l-l couldn't do jack for her.

418
00:44:19,607 --> 00:44:21,438
- Hey.
- Don't touch me!

419
00:44:24,527 --> 00:44:26,643
Hey.

420
00:44:28,407 --> 00:44:31,479
- You okay?
- l saw her.

421
00:44:33,447 --> 00:44:38,475
l saw her through your eyes.
You stayed with her the whole time.

422
00:44:38,567 --> 00:44:44,119
Yeah, well, you got
to understand something, all right?

423
00:44:44,207 --> 00:44:47,882
l was-- l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

424
00:44:47,967 --> 00:44:51,676
Uh, give me something
l could work with.

425
00:44:51,767 --> 00:44:56,283
Yeah. Look, l--

426

Why didn't you do

427

You think any of those people

428

429
00:45:05,487 --> 00:45:08,559
l kept asking questions and...

430
00:45:08,647 --> 00:45:11,207

where it wasn't wanted.

431
00:45:15,047 --> 00:45:16,924
This your wife?

432
00:45:17,007 --> 00:45:21,319
Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not any more.
We're getting a divorce.

433

lt's funny.

434
00:45:26,007 --> 00:45:29,443
Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

435
00:45:29,527 --> 00:45:31,757
l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

436
00:45:31,847 --> 00:45:35,157
Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

437
00:45:45,287 --> 00:45:49,724
You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

438
00:45:54,527 --> 00:45:57,280
You gonna vanish
into thin air again?

439
00:46:00,967 --> 00:46:03,356
l thought l'd use
your front door.

440
00:46:06,207 --> 00:46:11,884
Look, man, um, l'm sorry
as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

441
00:46:13,367 --> 00:46:15,597
Yeah.

442
00:46:20,967 --> 00:46:22,446
Yeah.

443
00:46:23,367 --> 00:46:25,881
l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

444
00:46:25,967 --> 00:46:28,481

445
00:46:28,567 --> 00:46:31,957
And then my business
gets blown up real good.

446
00:46:32,047 --> 00:46:35,119
- Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

447
00:46:35,207 --> 00:46:37,641
l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

448
00:46:37,727 --> 00:46:41,959
He winked at me before hejumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

449
00:46:42,047 --> 00:46:44,242
He winked at ya?

450
00:46:44,327 --> 00:46:48,115
Musicians.
What else did you see?

451
00:46:48,207 --> 00:46:51,400
So far l haven't heard shit about what
you're going to do about all this crap!

452
00:46:51,127 --> 00:46:55,996
l mean, what do l get? My livelihood,
it got flushed away and went swirling.

453
00:46:58,007 --> 00:47:00,680
- You ain't lost everything.
- Yeah?

454
00:47:00,767 --> 00:47:05,522
And maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow!Jesus!

455
00:47:05,607 --> 00:47:08,326
Fair enough. Catch.

456
00:47:10,527 --> 00:47:14,122
-Jesus.
- Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

457
00:47:14,207 --> 00:47:16,118
What are you tellin' me, this--
You tellin' me this thing is real?

458
00:47:16,207 --> 00:47:19,563
All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

459
00:47:19,647 --> 00:47:23,526
Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

460
00:47:23,607 --> 00:47:27,600
You know, you're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

461
00:47:29,287 --> 00:47:32,324
Yeah. Eyes see.

462
00:47:32,407 --> 00:47:35,240
lt's one of the most important things

463
00:47:35,327 --> 00:47:38,125
Sister? She's supposed
to be your sister?

464
00:47:38,207 --> 00:47:41,677
My father's daughter.
That's right.

465
00:47:41,767 --> 00:47:45,770
What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

466
00:47:45,167 --> 00:47:47,840
Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

467
00:47:47,927 --> 00:47:50,441

What do you say?

468
00:47:50,527 --> 00:47:53,837
He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

469
00:47:53,927 --> 00:47:57,283
He-He told me to tell T-Bird

470
00:47:57,367 --> 00:48:01,565

And-- Draven.

471
00:48:01,647 --> 00:48:04,810

472
00:48:04,167 --> 00:48:06,203
Want to relax that thing now?

473
00:48:06,287 --> 00:48:10,758
And this bird man,
hejust happened to let you live, huh?

474
00:48:10,847 --> 00:48:14,760
You sure you ain't making all ofthis up
Just to save your own ass?

475
00:48:14,847 --> 00:48:17,520
l ain't makin' all this up.

476
00:48:17,607 --> 00:48:22,780
l ain't twisted

That's right.

714
01:12:42,581 --> 01:12:47,450
- What in the crap--
- Don't move! Hold it!

715
01:12:47,541 --> 01:12:50,817
That's all she wrote.
Move and we shoot!

716
01:12:58,381 --> 01:13:02,294
You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

717
01:13:05,621 --> 01:13:08,579
- Stop running immediately.
- Holy shit!

718
01:13:08,661 --> 01:13:11,221
...spread your arms and legs--

719
01:13:16,541 --> 01:13:21,137
Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

720
01:14:02,301 --> 01:14:04,531
Come on! Move it!

721
01:14:09,301 --> 01:14:11,769
My advice: next time duck.

722
01:14:13,741 --> 01:14:15,971
So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away doughnuts.

723
01:14:19,341 --> 01:14:21,590
Shit!

724
01:14:26,461 --> 01:14:28,929
l knew you were going to do that.

725
01:14:29,021 --> 01:14:33,936
Look at that out there. The whole
city ought a be in flames by now.

726
01:14:34,021 --> 01:14:36,296
The sky ought a be red.

727
01:14:36,381 --> 01:14:40,533
So that, l take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

728
01:14:40,621 --> 01:14:46,590
He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

729
01:14:46,141 --> 01:14:47,859
l like him already.

730
01:14:47,941 --> 01:14:50,933
The crow is his link...

731
01:14:51,021 --> 01:14:55,651
between the land of the living
and the realm of the dead.

732
01:14:55,741 --> 01:15:00,980
So kill the crow
and destroy the man.

733
01:15:24,981 --> 01:15:27,336
l'm coming home, Shelly.

734
01:16:13,821 --> 01:16:17,575
You're gonna say
l shouldn't be in the cemetery
in the middle of the night. Right?

735
01:16:17,661 --> 01:16:22,257
- The safest place in the world to be.
- That's 'cause everybody's dead.

736
01:16:22,341 --> 01:16:25,253
l knew you'd come here.

737
01:16:25,341 --> 01:16:27,616
lt's really late, Sarah.

738
01:16:27,701 --> 01:16:30,738
You didn't say goodbye.

739
01:16:30,821 --> 01:16:34,700
You're just gonna have to
forgive me for that.

740
01:16:34,781 --> 01:16:37,900
And you're never coming back.

741
01:16:44,941 --> 01:16:48,130
l gave this to Shelly once.

742
01:16:51,581 --> 01:16:54,414
l think she'd like you to have it.

743
01:16:58,301 --> 01:17:01,540
This way you'll always remember her.

744
01:17:01,141 --> 01:17:04,258
I'll never take it off.

745
01:17:20,821 --> 01:17:24,970
l'd better go sneak back in the house.

746
01:17:30,861 --> 01:17:33,614
Bye.

747
01:17:51,501 --> 01:17:53,731
Shh. Shh.

748
01:17:55,341 --> 01:17:57,855
Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart.

749
01:18:04,541 --> 01:18:06,896
Come on. Come on.

750
01:18:20,301 --> 01:18:23,577
What is that, some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

751
01:18:25,541 --> 01:18:28,101
I'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say? Hmm?

752
01:18:34,221 --> 01:18:37,452
Her eyes are so innocent.

753
01:18:48,581 --> 01:18:51,653
Eric! Eric, help! Eric!

754
01:19:32,821 --> 01:19:35,160
Quick impression for you.

755
01:19:35,101 --> 01:19:38,571
Caw! Caw! Bang!
Fuck, l'm dead!

756
01:19:38,661 --> 01:19:41,858
Give me the girl,
and I'll let you walk out of here.

757
01:19:43,861 --> 01:19:47,979
Well, well. Why don't you just give me
a minute to think about that, huh?

758
01:19:57,101 --> 01:19:59,137
Nah. Fuck it.

759
01:20:07,261 --> 01:20:09,980
Aw, fuck.

760
01:20:15,701 --> 01:20:18,773
Well, well, well, it does seem to me
that our little life...

761
01:20:18,861 --> 01:20:21,739
has undergone a rather significant
change in the past few minutes.

762
01:20:21,821 --> 01:20:24,813
Now wouldn't you agree?

763
01:20:27,741 --> 01:20:31,170
Well, for a ghost
you bleed just fine.

764
01:20:34,421 --> 01:20:36,571
- lt's still alive.
- Well, then kill it.

765
01:20:38,581 --> 01:20:40,856
Bye-bye, birdie.

766
01:21:23,541 --> 01:21:25,372
Aw, shit.

767
01:21:25,461 --> 01:21:29,613
Well, l just came by
to pay my respects, and here you are
gettin' all shot up again.

768
01:21:29,701 --> 01:21:32,169
- They've taken Sarah.
- How many?

769
01:21:32,261 --> 01:21:34,570
Two more.

770
01:21:34,661 --> 01:21:37,459
- l can handle it. Don't worry.
- l'm not worried.

771
01:21:37,541 --> 01:21:41,295
Look, here's the plan. You stay in
front, and when they run out of ammo,
I'll arrest 'em.

772
01:21:41,381 --> 01:21:45,100
That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

773
01:21:47,261 --> 01:21:50,378
Oh, shit.
You're bleedin' all over the place.

774
01:21:50,461 --> 01:21:52,975
l thought, you know,
you were invincible.

775
01:21:53,061 --> 01:21:56,371
l was. l'm not any more.

776
01:21:57,581 --> 01:22:01,540
Well, l guess you really will
need my help, won't you? Come on.

777
01:22:06,101 --> 01:22:07,898
You take that.

778
01:22:36,741 --> 01:22:40,510
- You were supposed to stay behind me.
- l think l messed up.

779
01:23:03,181 --> 01:23:08,938
This is all the power you ever had.
Now it is mine.

780
01:23:09,021 --> 01:23:12,730
Pity there is not more time...

781
01:23:12,821 --> 01:23:14,573
for us.

782
01:23:31,941 --> 01:23:34,694
Help me!
Eric, l'm scared!

783
01:23:37,301 --> 01:23:39,610
Let me go!

784
01:23:48,381 --> 01:23:51,259
Let her go!

785
01:23:52,661 --> 01:23:55,778
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

786
01:23:57,021 --> 01:23:59,137
- All right.
- No!

787
01:24:43,821 --> 01:24:45,698
Eric!

788
01:25:03,981 --> 01:25:06,734
- Sarah?
- Look out!

789
01:25:12,421 --> 01:25:14,730
Eric!

790
01:25:21,261 --> 01:25:25,618
You know, my daddy used to say,
""Every man's got a devil...

791
01:25:25,701 --> 01:25:27,896
and you can't rest till you find him.''

792
01:25:27,981 --> 01:25:33,499
Whatever happened back there
with you and your girlfriend,
l cleared that building.

793
01:25:33,581 --> 01:25:36,857
Hell, nothin' in this town
happens without my say-so.

794
01:25:36,941 --> 01:25:40,580
So l'm sorry if l spoiled
your wedding plans there, friend.

795
01:25:40,141 --> 01:25:43,190
But if it's any consolation to you...

796
01:25:43,101 --> 01:25:46,173
you have put a smile on my face.

797
01:25:46,261 --> 01:25:51,289
You got a lot of spirit, son.
l am gonna miss you.

798
01:25:51,381 --> 01:25:55,659
l have something to give you.
l don't want it any more.

799
01:25:59,941 --> 01:26:02,853
Thirty hours of pain.

800
01:26:05,101 --> 01:26:07,661
All at once!

801
01:26:09,501 --> 01:26:11,378
All for you.

802
01:26:35,221 --> 01:26:37,520
Yeah.

803
01:26:44,821 --> 01:26:47,494
Go help him.

804
01:26:51,301 --> 01:26:54,737
Are you alive?

805
01:26:56,621 --> 01:26:58,930
God, l need a cigarette.

806
01:27:04,381 --> 01:27:07,418
- Everybody else dead?
- You helped me.

807
01:27:08,701 --> 01:27:11,100
What you kept in here saved me.

808
01:27:11,101 --> 01:27:14,590
- Thanks.
- Don't mention it.

809
01:27:14,141 --> 01:27:17,292
I've been meaning to
come to church anyway.

810
01:27:21,821 --> 01:27:25,370
Oh, yuck.

811
01:27:25,461 --> 01:27:29,374
l'm quitting as of now, if l live.

812
01:27:38,421 --> 01:27:40,776
Stay with him until help comes.

813
01:27:40,861 --> 01:27:44,774
He'll be okay, right?

814
01:27:44,861 --> 01:27:47,694
Eric?

815

He does that a lot.

816

Shelly.

817
01:28:26,421 --> 01:28:29,299
- At least it stopped raining, huh?
- lt can't rain all the time.

818
01:28:29,381 --> 01:28:33,420
No, l don't believe it.
This nightmare your fault, Albrecht?

819
01:28:33,501 --> 01:28:36,413
- Look, you go on home. l'm okay.
- Okay.

820
01:28:36,501 --> 01:28:39,891

- Your vigilante's up on the roof.

821

- Get him out of here.

822

lf the people we love
